fields.name: Notes
fields.value:
:one: What is ElfHosted? See https://discord.com/channels/396055506072109067/1119489607592050698 for details
:two: Read my [Initial announcement](https://geek-cookbook.funkypenguin.co.nz/blog/2023/06/08/kubectl-deploy-elfhosted/)
:three: Geek out over the stats one month in, [here](https://geek-cookbook.funkypenguin.co.nz/blog/2023/07/08/elfhosted-status-update-june-2023/)
:four: Visual learner? Check out these screenshots! [#1](https://static.funkypenguin.co.nz/2023/Screenshot_2023-07-11_at_10-02-15_ElfHosted_-_funkypenguin.png) [#2](https://static.funkypenguin.co.nz/2023/Screenshot_2023-07-11_at_10-14-06_ElfHosted_-_funkypenguin.png)

description:
Good news @everyone, my new geek-baby :baby:, the ElfHosted :elf: platform, is finally ready for "elf-a" testing! 

Now, I need testers! :rofl:  

:pray::heart: *[Help me test ElfHosted](https://elfhosted.com)* :heart::pray:

I'd treasure your insights - even if you're not at all interested in a geeky, gitops-driven, kubernetes-based "selfhosting-as-a-service" platform, your feedback / comments would help to squish bugs :bug: and direct further build :construction_site: efforts! 

The platform is 100% free until Aug (*coupon code `THISISWHYWETEST`, no credit card required*), so you can test risk-free.

(*See [#ðŸ§»â”†roles](https://discord.com/channels/396055506072109067/1128066382840467579) to subscribe to updates*)
